title: Portes Fermes
short: This inspirational website was built by the acclaimed Canadian Locomotive agency
body: Built by the acclaimed Canadian [Locomotive](https://locomotive.ca/) agency. This site features several stunning animation reveals & mouse effects, clever page transitions, as well as superb use of audio which interacts with user actions. > The Office for the Integration of Newcomers to Montreal wishes to promote professional integration of immigrants in Montreal by simple actions that can make all the difference. Turn up your sound & [check it out](https://portesfermees.ca/?sound=true)! ## Related Posts: * [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites \[April 2020]](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
